1: <pb/><t>Aleluya! <pb/>Tinnima ru li Qaawa' chi anchal linch'ool.</t>
2: <t>Tinnima xloq'al li Qaawa' jo' najtil tinwanq sa' ruuchich'och';</t> <t>tinb'ichanq cho'q re linYos jo' najtil chik tinyo'yooq.<f>[373]</f></t>
3: <pb/><t>Meesik' xk'ojob'ankil eech'ool rik'ineb' li xninqal ru winq:</t> <t>a'an yal winqeb', ut ink'a' naru texkole'q xb'aaneb'.</t>
4: <t>Te'elq xmusiq', ut ch'och' te'sutq'iiq wi':</t> <t>sa' ajwi' li kutan a'an taaraqe'q chixjunil li xk'uub'ahomeb'.</t>
5: <pb/><t>Us xaq re li kaw xch'ool chirix li xYos laj Jakob,</t> <t>a' li xaqxo li royb'enihom rik'in li Qaawa' li xYos:</t>
6: <t>a'an laj winqob'resihom re choxach'och',</t> <t>a'an kiyiib'ank re li palaw ut chixjunil li wank chisa'.<f>[374]</f></t> <t>Li Qaawa' wank sa' tiikilal chi junelik.</t>
7: <t>A'an naraqok aatin chirixeb' li rahob'tesinb'ileb'<f>[375]</f></t> <t>ut naxk'e xwaheb' li te'tz'okaaq. <pb/>Li Qaawa' narach'ab' li wankeb' sa' tz'alam,</t>
8: <t>ut naxte xsa' ruheb' li mutz';</t> <t>li Qaawa' naxwaklesi wi' chik li xe't'ane'k,</t> <t>ut naxraheb' li tiikeb' xch'ool;</t>
9: <t>li Qaawa' naxkoleb' laj ab'l tenamit,</t> <t>naril li neb'a'yox ut li xmalka'an,</t> <t>ab'an naxpo' xk'a'uxl li ink'a' us xna'leb'.</t>
10: <pb/><t>Li Qaawa' na'awab'ejink chi junelik.</t> <t>At Si√≥n, wank xwankil laaYos</t> <t>junq'e junq'e kutan. <pb/>Aleluya!</t>
